Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with part of a lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; exterior: painted decoration consisting possibly of part of animal; part of pendant triangle as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0555) (phase 2)
